
# Function


## ```js log ```


This function is a simple wrapper around the SLog class that let you use the log features quickly

## Parameters

- **message**  Mixed: The message to log



## Example (js)

```js
import log from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/log/log';
log('Hello world');
```
